title: Intro to Sonic Smart Contracts
description: Learn to write and deploy smart contracts on Sonic EVM. Master Solidity fundamentals and understand the unique features of Sonic's high-performance blockchain.

title: DeFi on Sonic: AMMs & Lending
description: Build sophisticated AMM protocols and lending platforms. Explore advanced DeFi mechanisms and implement real-world financial primitives.

title: Advanced Performance & Gas Optimization
description: Master gas optimization techniques and advanced patterns. Learn to build ultra-efficient contracts that leverage Sonic's speed advantages.

title: Developer Tooling & Testing Mastery
description: Set up professional development environments, implement comprehensive testing strategies, and master CI/CD for Sonic projects.

title: Smart Contract Security & Auditing
description: Learn to identify vulnerabilities, perform security audits, and implement best practices for secure smart contract development.

title: Building Cross-Chain Bridges
description: Design and implement secure cross-chain bridges. Understand interoperability protocols and connect Sonic with other blockchains.
